page.title: 17HOTEL DE FRANCE &SUN TEA WKS
page.content: {HOTEL DE FRANCE When it was opened in 1867 it was called the {Imperial.}From 1880 it was a{Jesuit College,}and in 1940 it was used by the {Germans.}After the war the hotel was closed until 1953,and since then it has been extended and now includes the {Lido de France {complex.}This is one of Jersey's main entertainment centres. There is a cinema, a {fitness centre}with a large range of activities, a{disco, karate {club, bars, car wash}and multi-storey car park. Also on the site is a large exhibition hall used for such things as the{Ideal Homes exhibition. {SUN TEA WORKS.}The tea factory started in 1886 and sells all different kinds of tea which is shipped all over Europe. It does not just make normal tea, it also makes fruit teas such as orange and lemon.
